ygData.subject: RE: Resist on chains gotten worse lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: you forgot cazic thule for kill stealers... And then there s Genni thats MIA on another note, i found that screech is resisted more this morning, dang guard
ygData.messageBody:
you forgot cazic thule for kill stealers...
And then there's Genni thats MIA

on another note, i found that screech is resisted more this morning, dang
guard resisted me 7 times in a row. then again, might just be bad luck

Minkin
Sol Ro
